data.chText: 令人惊异的人（或事）；奇迹
data.enText: a wonderful and surprising person or thing

data.chText: 大自然的 / 技术的奇迹
不平凡的成果；成就；奇迹
data.enText: wonderful results or things that have been achieved
The doctors have done marvels for her.
to be very surprised or impressed by sth

data.chText: 人人对他的勇气都惊叹不已。

ex.chText: 他们赶上了火车，这真是个奇迹。
ex.enText: It was a miracle that they managed to catch the train.
That old man believes in miracles.

synonyms.bx: 指未预料到的或认为不太可能发生的幸运之事，也可指神创造的奇迹。

ex.chText: 他90岁高龄了还在继续自己的研究工作，他绝对是个了不起的人！
ex.enText: He continued to work on his research as he reached the age of 90 - he was an absolute marvel!

ex.chText: 人们认为这些是现代科学的奇迹。
ex.enText: People believe that these are the marvels of modern science.

synonyms.bx: 指令人惊异的人或事物，含极为有用或灵巧之意。

ex.enText: What are the eight wonders/marvels of the world?

ex.chText: 你认为哪些是十大科技奇迹？
ex.enText: According to you, what are the top 10 technological wonders/marvels?

ex.chText: 科罗拉多大峡谷是世界自然奇观之一。
ex.enText: The Grand Canyon is one of the natural wonders/marvels of the world.

synonyms.bx: 指令人惊异、赞叹的事物，包括自然奇观和人创造的奇迹，作此义解时可与 marvel 换用。

tr: something that causes feelings of wonder

example: We marvelled at the child's linguistic abilities

tr: express astonishment or surprise about something

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 marveling, mar-veled

value.def: If you marvel at something, you express your great surprise, wonder, or admiration.

example.ex: Her fellow members marveled at her seemingly infinite energy...
example.tran: 她的同事们对她似乎无穷的精力大为惊叹。

example.ex: Sara and I read the story and marveled...
example.tran: 我和萨拉读了这部小说后惊叹不已。

example.ex: 'That's the weirdest thing I've ever seen,' marveled Carl...
example.tran: 卡尔惊叹道：“那是我所见过的最怪异的事情了。”

example.ex: He marvelled that a man in such intense pain could be so coherent.
example.tran: 一个男人在如此剧痛下还能这般条理清晰，对此他赞叹不已。

value.tran: 惊讶不已;不胜惊羡;大为赞叹

value.def: You can describe something or someone as a marvel to indicate that you think that they are wonderful.

example.ex: The whale, like the dolphin, has become a symbol of the marvels of creation...
example.tran: 鲸和海豚一样，已经成为造物杰作的象征。

example.ex: A new technological marvel was invented at Cambridge University in England, the scanning electron microscope.
example.tran: 一项科技新奇迹在英国剑桥大学诞生了——这就是扫描电子显微镜。

value.tran: 不可思议的事(或人);奇迹

value.def: Marvels are things that people have done, or that have happened, which are very unexpected or surprising.

example.ex: She almost died, but the hospital's skill achieved great marvels...
example.tran: 她已经奄奄一息，但是医院的技术却创造了伟大的奇迹。

example.ex: He's done marvels with the team...
It was a marvel that the floor never gave way.
example.tran: 惊奇的是地板居然从未塌陷。

trans: 惊奇；惊叹于；惊叹；对…惊奇
